articles.description: Euro 2024 latest news and reaction as England miss the chance to qualify for the last 16 with a draw against Denmark, while Italy and Spain met in Group B.

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from first and second practice at the Spanish Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 practice LIVE: Spanish Grand Prix 2024 times, results and commentary from Barcelona

articles.description: Ex-England captain Alan Shearer explains why it is better for Three Lions players to stay in the bubble at their team camp to deal with criticism over their performances at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'England are about to really feel the pressure now' - Alan Shearer

articles.description: Pat Cummins takes a hat-trick as Australia beat Bangladesh by 28 runs on the DLS method to start their Super 8s campaign with a win.

articles.description: American boxer Ryan Garcia has been banned from boxing for one year.
articles.title: Boxing: Ryan Garcia handed one-year doping ban

articles.description: Former West Ham manager David Moyes on watching new players at Euro 2024 and how the latest generation of coaches means the game is always evolving.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Scouting with David Moyes - 'I'm here as a fan but think like a manager'

articles.description: Child star, teen social media icon and now wanted by Europe's top clubs, is it tim for Xavi Simons to star for Netherlands at Euro 2024?
articles.title: Xavi Simons: Is it time for Netherlands forward to shine at Euro 2024?

articles.description: Lexi Thompson cards a 68 to lead after round one of the Women's PGA Championship, with England's Charley Hull in early contention.
articles.title: Women's PGA Championship: Lexi Thompson leads after first round

articles.title: Wales sack Rob Page: Manager leaves after three years in charge
